items.title: VEGAN and GLUTEN FREE WAFFLES
items.descript: Our gluten free flour and brown sugar. With vegan butter and local maple syrup.

items.title: FARM HOUSE WAFFLES
items.descript: Free range eggs, whole wheat flour and brown sugar. With real butter and local maple syrup.
items.listdescript: For an extra dollar (1$) both types of waffles allow you to choose up to three (3) of the following toppings: fresh fruit, walnuts, pumpkin seeds, chocolate chips, coconut, bee pollen, goji berries, or peanut butter.

items.title: OAT AND ALMOND PANCAKES (raw)
items.descript: Made with rolled oats, almond pulp, dates, cinnamon and coconut, then semi dehydrated and topped with fresh fruit. Served with walnut cream and local maple syrup.

items.title: MUESLI (raw)
items.descript: A Swiss cereal type dish made with oats, goji berries, hemp seeds, coconut, raisins, walnuts, sunflower seeds,pumpkin seeds and fresh fruit, served with house made raw nut milk.

items.title: GRANOLA BOWL
items.descript: House made granola is vegan and gluten free. Made with maple syrup and olive oil. It comes with fresh fruit, and one of your choosing, organic European yogurt, organic soy yogurt, local goat milk yogurt, or raw nut milk.

items.title: MUFFIN AND FRUIT OF THE DAY
items.descript: House made muffin of the day is vegan and gluten free. It comes with fresh fruit, local honey and one of your choosing, organic European yogurt, local goat milk yogurt, or organic soy yogurt .

menulist.title: savory
menulist.note: All Savory meals come with a side salad, roasted vegetables, or a fruit cup.

items.title: BREAKFAST BURRITO
items.descript: Tomato wheat wrap, TVP scramble or two cage free eggs, seasoned black beans, tomatoes and avocado. Or get it with corn tortillas instead of the flour tortilla.

items.title: VEGETABLE OMELETTE
items.descript: Three free range eggs, spinach, zucchini, tomato and local goat cheese. Comes with toast.

items.title: CURRY EGGS
items.descript: Three free range eggs, local goat cheese, curry and onion, scrambled with arugula. Comes with toast.

items.title: EGG SANDWICH
items.descript: Two free range eggs, whole wheat or gluten free bread, cream cheese, local feta cheese, spinach and tomato.

items.title: POTATO AND KALE TACOS
items.descript: Corn tortillas, cashew cheese, pickled red onions, and a sun dried tomato sauce. Also available as a wrap.

items.title: ROASTED VEGETABLE SALAD
items.descript: Mixed organic baby greens, roasted vegetables, local goat cheese, and a lemon, apple cider vinegar and olive oil dressing.

items.title: garden salad
items.descript: Mixed organic baby greens, tomato, carrots, cucumber, sunflower seeds, red pepper, and a balsamic and extra virgin olive oil dressing

items.title: GRILLED TEMPEH SALAD
items.descript: Arugula, grilled tempeh, sun dried tomatoes, olives, cucumber and local feta cheese and a balsamic and olive oil dressing.

items.title: TEMPEH BACON
items.descript: w/ sweet potato, red potato, yellow curry, garlic, onion, chick peas, and coconut milk.

items.title: SINGLE MUFFIN
items.descript: Our gluten free muffin of the day.

items.title: Extra Egg
items.descript: *Free range. Get them scrambled or fried.

items.title: Various
items.descript: side salad, roasted vegetables, or a side of fruit
